body:
Hi Everyone,


Day one of the workshop was a success, thanks to our NREL hosts.
 Presentations from the first day have been uploaded to radiance-online.org:


http://www.radiance-online.org/community/workshops/2013-golden-co


Also, Radiance now has a facebook page!
http://www.facebook.com/RadianceSimulation


Best,
Andy
